dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependent_to.description: A suite of c++ libraries for radio astronomy data processing.
dependent_to.name: casacore

dependent_to.description:
The PAL library is a partial re-implementation of Pat Wallace's popular
SLALIB library written in C using a Gnu GPL license and layered on top
of the IAU's SOFA library (or the BSD-licensed ERFA) where appropriate.
dependent_to.name: pal

description: Standards of Fundamental Astronomy (SOFA) library for ANSI C.
name: sofa-c

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
